dame.description: Leader releases partner and picks up the next partner in the circle.

otra.description: Special move only callable directly after Dame.

enchufla_y_vamos_pal_centro.description: Send partner to the center of the circle.

el_flor.description: Dancers form a flower pattern in the center.

enganchan_los_hombres.description: Men hook arms in the center.

enganchan_las_chicas.description: Women hook arms into the circle.

dile_que_no.description: Leader moves follower from closed to open position.

exhibela.description: A move where the leader shows off the follower's styling by turning them into the circle.

enchufla.description: The leader turns follower under their left arm and then does a Dame.

abajo.description: Leader steps in a Y formation and the follow does back-rocks.

setenta.description: A more advanced move involving cross-hand hold and turns.

arriba_tiempo_espana.description: Closed position move where the leads walk forward and the follows walk backwards

pal_medio.description: In closed position, step in and out of the circle

sacando_agua.description: While in closed position, make a motion as if you are bailing water from the center of the circle

abajo_de_verdad.description: Same motion as Abajo, but the leads are moving backwards on the 2 and 6 and the follows are going forward on the 2 and 6

enchufla_doble.description: Do enchufla, then instead of ending the move, block the follow with your right hand, then do another enchufla

dame_dos.description: Dame, but go to the second follow instead of the next follow

dame_directo.description: While in open position, make more tension on the 123 and then walk past the follow your left and land with the next follow on the 5

exhibela_2_con_1.description: Do Exhibela twice normally and then a third time with the lead also turning to the right

dame_2_con_2.description: Dame dos, but clap twice on the 1 and 2 when you get to the follow

candado.description: Enchufla, keeping the right hand, then enchufla back the other way, then put both of your hands up and turn to the right

kentucky.description: Enchufla keeping the right hand, then enchufla the other way, then put your left hand on their left shoulder, with their left hand, blocking them, then enchufla and turn to the right

el_uno.description: The follow goes in front of the lead, then the follow and lead are doing opposite back-rocks. Can exit with lead putting their right hand up when the follow is going to the left and then turning right or doing El Tren.

el_tren.description: After el uno, when you turn to the right to get out of it, keep your left hand and walk forward. Ends when dile que no is called

el_dos.description: The lead goes in front of the follow (enchufla), doing back-rocks. Get out of it by putting your right hand up when the follow is going left and then doing sombrero

el_12.description: El uno and then el dos

sombrero.description: Right hand over left, turn your hands clockwise, keeping them up, until you have your right hand on the follow's right shoulder.

adios.description: Use the tension when both you and the follow go backwards and move towards the left of the follow and walk in a circle and then go to the next person in the rueda

adios_con_la_hermana.description: Adios, but you like your sister, so you stay with her instead of switching partners

adios_con_la_prima.description: Adios, but you kind of like your cousin, so you do the first part of adios con la hermana, but you switch partners at the end

adios_con_la_familia.description: Adios, then enchufla and lock shoulders and then move to the next follow

enchufla_por_arriba.description: Enchufla, then enchufla yourself and put your hand above you on the 567, then do another enchufla

enchufla_por_abajo.description: Enchufla, then enchufla yourself and put your hand down on the 567, then enchufla
